booking.hotel.name: Abba Sants

cancellationpolicies.text: Cancellation made less than 1 day (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 50% of the total booking value.

booking.bookedBy: TEST BOOKING, VOUCHER NOT VALID FOR USE. TEST BOOKING, VOUCHER NOT VALID FOR USE. SunHotels T: 0034 971 425588

hotelNote.text: All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.

englishHotelNote.text: All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.
